sect1.title: Pax-&pax-version;

sect2.title: Installation de Pax
sect2.para: This package has somewhat unusual installation instructions, because pax is part of a larger set of utilities included in the same tarball. Issue the following

screen.userinput: sed -i build/mk.config \ -e '/LIBZ/s@ -Wl[^ ]*@@g' \ -e '/LIBBZ2/{s@^#@@;s@ -Wl[^ ]*@@g}' \ -e '/BZLIB/s@0@1@' && make makefiles && make -C libcommon && make -C libuxre && make -C cpio

sect2.title: Explications des commandes
sect2.para: sed ... : This changes the configuration file build/mk.config so that the system zlib et libbz2 are used et linked as shared libraries.
make makefiles : This command builds all the makefiles.
make -C lib... : First builds the necessary libraries.
make -C cpio : Then builds the archive utilities.

listitem.para: copies files to et from archives in several formats.
